lead_paragraph: Egypt does not suffer from war or grinding poverty, but lack of opportunity, permissive Italian laws and the examples of other Egyptian teenagers have led to a surge in migration.

headline.print_headline: Facebook Envy Attracts Teenagers Across Egypt to Europe and Migrant Life
headline.main: Facebook Envy Lures Egyptian Teenagers to Europe and the Migrant Life

snippet: Egypt does not suffer from war or grinding poverty, but lack of opportunity, permissive Italian laws and the examples of other Egyptian teenagers have led to a surge in migration.
abstract: Growing number of Egyptian teenagers are fleeing fishing villages of country's north, enticed by Italy's liberal deportation laws and European life as depicted in friends' Facebook photos; few aspiring migrants grasp either grave dangers of Mediterranean crossing or grim side of refugee life on Continent.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
